subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Alabama’s smothering defense held Creighton to 22 points below its season average, but the Bluejays still managed to rally from an 11-point second-half deficit.
snippet: Alabama’s smothering defense held Creighton to 22 points below its season average, but the Bluejays still managed to rally from an 11-point second-half deficit.
